attributes.additional_details: If it’s ok to sit in a restaurant with friends why can’t it be ok to sit in pub .. we as publicans have gone out our way to make sure our pubs  are COVID SAFE ... there’s no proof in the rising of cases  of the virus being directed at being in a pub
attributes.background: To allow pubs to open in tier 2

rejection.details:
Pubs in Tier 2 areas are allowed to open, provided they only serve alcohol with a substantial meal.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Do not require pubs and bars in Tier 2 to only serve alcohol with a meal: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561619
